{'description': 'A Google Pub/Sub topic where notifications can be published when a location is updated or has a new review. There will be only one notification setting resource per-account.', 'properties': {'name': {'description': 'Required. The resource name this setting is for. This is of the form `accounts/{account_id}/notificationSetting`.', 'type': 'string'}, 'notificationTypes': {'description': 'The types of notifications that will be sent to the Pub/Sub topic. To stop receiving notifications entirely, use NotificationSettings.UpdateNotificationSetting with an empty notification_types or set the pubsub_topic to an empty string.', 'items': {'enum': ['NOTIFICATION_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED', 'GOOGLE_UPDATE', 'NEW_REVIEW', 'UPDATED_REVIEW', 'NEW_CUSTOMER_MEDIA', 'NEW_QUESTION', 'UPDATED_QUESTION', 'NEW_ANSWER', 'UPDATED_ANSWER', 'DUPLICATE_LOCATION', 'LOSS_OF_VOICE_OF_MERCHANT', 'VOICE_OF_MERCHANT_UPDATED'], 'enumDeprecated': [False, False, False, False, False, False, False, False, False, False, True, False], 'type': 'string'}, 'type': 'array'}, 'pubsubTopic': {'description': 'Optional. The Google Pub/Sub topic that will receive notifications when locations managed by this account are updated. If unset, no notifications will be posted. data.current_description: Returns the pubsub notification settings for the account.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the Pub/Sub notification settings for the specified business account. Returns the current notification setting resource containing the configured Pub/Sub topic and subscribed notification types. Requires the account resource name in the format 'accounts/{accountId}'.

message: Operation 'mybusinessnotifications.accounts.updateNotificationSetting' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description is verbose and lacks clear structure about inputs/outputs. Improved by: (1) adding concise summary, (2) clarifying that notification_types is an array, (3) explicitly stating the return value (updated NotificationSetting), (4) using consistent terminology ('Pub/Sub' capitalization), (5) reorganizing for better readability and AI agent comprehension of the operation's effects and constraints.

data.current_description: Sets the pubsub notification setting for the account informing Google which topic to send pubsub notifications for. Use the notification_types field within notification_setting to manipulate the events an account wants to subscribe to. An account will only have one notification setting resource, and only one pubsub topic can be set. To delete the setting, update with an empty notification_types
data.description_suggestion: Updates the Pub/Sub notification settings for the specified business account. Configures which Pub/Sub topic receives notifications and which notification types (events) to subscribe to via the notification_types field. Each account maintains only one notification setting resource with a single Pub/Sub topic. To remove all subscriptions, update with an empty notification_types array. Returns the updated NotificationSetting resource.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is verbose and lacks clear structure about inputs/outputs. Improved by: (1) adding concise summary, (2) clarifying that notification_types is an array, (3) explicitly stating the return value (updated NotificationSetting), (4) using consistent terminology ('Pub/Sub' capitalization), (5) reorganizing for better readability and AI agent comprehension of the operation's effects and constraints.
